description: {"blocks":[{"key":"c250i","text":"Abstract:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21b5h","text":"As part of the GP2 initiative we will generate long-read sequencing data for ~1000 samples to better understand the genetic architecture of Parkinson's disease. To generate this large-scale Nanopore data we have developed a protocol for processing and long-read sequencing frozen human blood samples, targeting an N50 of ~30kb and ~30X coverage.
